pli-tv-kd11:1.1.5: alamattatarā ca → alamatthatarā ca (s1-3, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:1.3.1: asantuṭṭhitāya → asantuṭṭhiyā (bj, pts1) | asantuṭṭhatāya (s1-3) | vīriyārambhassa → viriyārambhassa (bj, s1-3, pts1) | vīriyārabbhassa (mr) | Atha kho bhagavā te → paṇḍukalohitake (s1-3)
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.9: okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti → bhikkhū bhikkhūhi sampayojeti (s1-3)
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.2: āpattiṃ āropetabbo → āpatti āropetabbā (bj, s1-3); āpattiṃ ropetabbo (pts1)
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.28: () → (yepi te manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṃ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā yānipi tāni saṅghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni riñcanti pesalā bhikkhū nivasanti pāpabhikkhū) (s1-3)
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.9: Adhivāsesuṃ kho therā bhikkhū → adhivāsesuṃ kho te therā bhikkhū (s1-3)
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.13: sudhammo bhikkhu cittassa gahapatino dassanūpacāraṃ avijahāpetvā savanūpacāraṃ avijahāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā taṃ āpattiṃ desāpetabbo”ti → sudhammaṃ bhikkhuṃ … sā āpatti desāpetabbāti (sī1, syā1-3)
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.28: channo bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā → channo bhikkhu āpattiyā (bj, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.4: na garuṃ kariṃsu → na garukariṃsu (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.44: channo bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā → channo bhikkhu āpattiyā (bj, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.34: gaddhabādhipubbo, saṃghena pāpikāya → gandhabādhipubbo saṅghena pāpikāya (s1-3); gaddhabādhipubbo pāpikāya (pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.33: uppannānipi vaḍḍhare → uppannāni ca vaḍḍhare (bj); uppannāpi pavaḍḍhanti (pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.151: pañcakāti nāmakā → dve pañcakoti nāmako (pts1, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.156: paṭisārī ca → paṭisārīnaṃ (bj) | paṭisāri ca (s1-3, pts1) | Pabbajjā → pabbajaṃ (bj); pabbājā (pts1, mr)
